summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the SDNY summarizing a call with attorney Dave Kelley regarding the Apollo/Leon Black internal investigation into Black's financial relationship with Jeffrey Epstein. The email notes the investigation's mandate and Kelley's request for publicly available information from SDNY.

persons.name: Dave Kelley

persons.name: Leon Black

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

events.title: Call between Dave Kelley and SDNY
events.description: Dave Kelley of Dechert law firm called the SDNY to inquire about publicly available information regarding Leon Black's relationship with Jeffrey Epstein and Epstein's source of expertise.

keyFacts: An internal investigation was being conducted by Dechert attorneys on behalf of Apollo Global Management regarding Leon Black's relationship with Jeffrey Epstein.
The investigation's mandate was to understand the nature of the relationship and why Black was paying Epstein money, with indications the payments were for reasons other than services provided.
Attorney Dave Kelley reached out to the SDNY seeking publicly available information that could shed light on Black's relationship with Epstein or Epstein's source of expertise.
The email confirms ongoing scrutiny of financial ties between high-profile financiers and Jeffrey Epstein even after his death.
